full_summary:
### Government Tender for Office Furniture
### French: *Appel d'offres pour mobilier de bureau*

#### Key Information

* Title: Furniture – Categories 3 and 6
* Date of Publication: January 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* Tender Reference Number: PW-23-01019339
* Solicitation Number: IRCC-155742
* Location: Nova Scotia

#### Notice Type and Method

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal – Competitive-Selective Tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Citizenship and Immigration Canada
* Address: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada

#### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Nada Moazin
* Contact Email: <nada.moazin@cic.gc.ca>
* Contact Phone: N/A
* Contact Fax: N/A
* Contact Address: 70 Crémazie Street, Gatineau, Qc, K1A 1L1, Canada

#### Tender Documents

* Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/02](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/02)

#### Description

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in New Waterford, Nova Scotia by March 31, 2023. This notice of proposed procurement (NPP) covers a requirement to be solicited amongst general stream suppliers (Supply Arrangement holders). There is no security requirement associated with the requirement.

#### Specifications

The requirement falls under two product categories:

* Category 3: Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
* Category 6: Collaborative Furniture

#### Application of this NPP

This NPP is issued pursuant to the Public Services and Procurement Canada Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. A proposer will be expected to provide a comprehensive proposal including the supporting documents required for evaluation. The evaluation and award process will be conducted in accordance with the applicable legislation and policy. Further information can be obtained from the attached documents or by contacting the Contracting Authority.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will include:

* bidder reputation and
